snippet: The police have issued an order that could place the lawyer, Zhang Kai, under secretive detention for six months, a colleague said.
abstract: Zhang Kai, Chinese lawyer who objects to government effort to demolish churches and church crosses, faces up to six months in isolated detention after police accuse him of threatening state security.
lead_paragraph: The police have issued an order that could place the lawyer, Zhang Kai, under secretive detention for six months, a colleague said.
